it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp

Class Mangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp.Mangle

  • public class Mangle
extends java.lang.Object
    DhcpMangle collects all static methods for mangling dhcp binary-data structures
